column4: If I have say 5 windows machines on a small wireless network and I then have an ubuntu box, that inet connection shares to another windows box - How can I let all clients on the network access media on the windows box behind the Ubuntu box, or is it really worth the hassle??
you could use IP forwarding so that they can contact the other windows machine using the ubuntu machine as a switch essentially
Is that straight forward enough to do??
